description: Derived cache component that lists the followers of a leader. This component's data is non-authoritative and is rebuilt automatically by SystemRules. It MUST NOT be mutated directly.

followers.description: An array of namespaced IDs for all entities currently following this one.

activityMetadata.description: Inline metadata for activity description generation. Allows this component to define how it should be described in activity summaries without requiring a separate metadata component.

shouldDescribeInActivity.description: Whether this component should be included in activity descriptions. Set to false to hide from activity summaries.

template.description: Template string with placeholders: {actor} for the entity with this component. Note: This is an array-based component, so template uses generic phrasing.

targetRole.description: Property name in this component's data containing follower IDs. This is an array field requiring special handling by the activity service.

priority.description: Display priority for activity ordering. Higher values appear first. Range: 0-100. Slightly lower than 'following' (58) to prefer describing from follower's perspective and avoid redundancy.
